scripts.publish: cd packages/solidjs-virtualisation && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.start-local: cd examples/solidjs-virtualisation && npm run prepare && npm run start
scripts.start-live: cd examples/solidjs-virtualisation && npm install solidjs-virtualisation@latest && npm run start
scripts.install: cd packages/solidjs-virtualisation && npm install && cd ../../examples/solidjs-virtualisation && npm install
